sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Image, Stack, Heading, Button } from '@chakra-ui/react'

function SingleItem({title, desc, url, urlToImage, publishedAt}) {
  return (
    <Card
  direction={{ base: 'column', sm: 'row' }}
  overflow='hidden'
  variant='outline'
>
  <Image
    objectFit='cover'
    maxW={{ base: '100%', sm: '200px' }}
    src={urlToImage}
  />

  <Stack>
    <CardBody>
      <Heading size='md'>The perfect latte</Heading>

      <Text py='2'>
         {title}
      </Text>
    </CardBody>

    <CardFooter>
      <Button variant='solid' colorScheme='blue'>
        Buy Latte
      </Button>
    </CardFooter>
  </Stack>
</Card>
  )
}

export default SingleItem
